plot: A man attempts to kill himself because he cannot bear with the memory of his dead wife. Through his fever dreams he tries to let her memory go.
title: After Forever
plot_es: A man attempts to kill himself because he cannot bear with the memory of his dead wife. Through his fever dreams he tries to let her memory go.
plot_en: A man attempts to kill himself because he cannot bear with the memory of his dead wife. Through his fever dreams he tries to let her memory go.
